invalid_date.text: Disculpe, no pudimos entender la fecha. Escriba la fecha correcta de la siguiente manera: 31-08 16:24

invalid_date_future.text: Sorry, you can't report dates in the future. Please try again.

invalid_multiple_choice.text: Sorry. We couldn't understand your answer. Please type all the letters that apply (ex. abc).

invalid_multiple_none_choice.text: Sorry. You cannot choose "none of these" and another answer. Please choose only "none of these" or the other options (ex1. abc, ex2. h).

invalid_single_choice.text: Sorry. We couldn't understand your answer. Please type only one letter (ex. a).

invalid_location.text: Sorry. It looks like we couldn't find that location. Please select a location by tapping the plus button, select "location," and drop a pin where the accident happened.
